content.prompt: In the lines (“Will anybody say . . . less happy”), the passage concludes by

choices.label: implying that domestic contentment is achievable only through academic study
acknowledging the controversial nature of the topic it explores
insinuating that virtuous conduct usually entails sacrifice

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
